original_title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriters Alex Kurtzman and Roberto Orci
overview: Poised to become one of the most successful screenwriting teams in Hollywood, Alex Kurtzman and Roberto Orci are certainly in striking position. A team who became just that after meeting in high school, they have frequently collaborated with writer-director J.J. Abrams and director Michael Bay. As a team their screenwriting credits include The Island, The Legend of Zorro, Mission: Impossible III and the upcoming Star Trek XI.
tagline: An interview series that gives unprecedented looks into the lives of working screenwriters.
title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriters Alex Kurtzman and Roberto Orci
